title: The Day Garry Moved In
description: Garry moves into a new house near his friends Pete and Nancy, has his furniture stolen, and endures a grueling date with the beautiful-but-boring woman who installed his cable tv.

title: Grant Gets Broken
description: Garry offers to watch Grant when Pete and Nancy take a trip in an attempt to prove that he's responsible, but gets in trouble when Grant accidentally hurts his eye.

title: Garry Throws a Surprise Party
description: Garry has a birthday party for his mother who suffers a heart attack when the studio audience yells "surprise" too loudly. Feeling guilty, Garry turns to Father Guido Sarducci for guidance.

title: Foul Ball
description: Garry and Pete take Grant's Cub Scout troupe to a Dodgers game, but when Pete is hit in the nose by a foul ball and teased by the other Cub Scouts because of it, Grant loses respect for him.

title: The Graduate
description: In an homage to

title: It's Garry Shandling's Problem, But It's Jo-Jo's Show
description: Garry's attempt to focus the entire episode on contest winner Jodi Jones goes awry when Nancy's sex addicted friend arrives for a visit.

title: Garry Met a Girl Named Maria
description: Garry agrees to marry the studio's cleaning woman so she doesn't get deported to Guatemala.

title: Grant's Date
description: Garry serves as the chaperon for Grant's first date, but Grant gets upset when the girl ends up having a crush on Garry, instead.

title: Pete Has an Affair
description: Pete is full of guilt after having an affair.

title: Fate
description: Garry tries to alter fate when a psychic tells him that something bad is going to happen to Nancy on her upcoming date.

title: The Morning After
description: Garry hosts a party for Pete's parents' anniversary. No one will talk to him the next day, but he doesn't know why.

title: Sarah
description: Garry's ex-girlfriend is back in town, and he's interested again.

title: Laffie
description: Garry finds a collie and wants to keep him, but Leonard won't let him.

title: Dial L for Laundry
description: Garry meets Sylvia in the condo laundry room, but has to contend with her ex.

title: Dinner with Garry
description: Garry sets his mother up on a date with his doctor.

title: Force Boxman
description: Garry gets the lead in a new police drama, so Red Buttons takes over the show.

title: No Baby, No Show
description: Jackie goes into labor, during which Tom Petty and Susan Anton stop by to help with the delivery.

title: It's Garry and Angelica's Show: Part 1
It's Garry and Angelica's Show: Part 2
description: While Garry's away, Leonard makes his move on Angelica.

title: What's Happening to Me?
description: Garry does a song and dance during an operetta about Grant and a mature female classmate to impress Los Angeles mayor Tom Bradley.

title: The Natural
description: Garry attempts to make a comeback at ping pong in spite of an incident that put an end to his ping pong days 18 years ago.

title: Worry Wart
description: Garry takes pain medication and inadvertently reveals a secret that puts Ian's plans with Molly in jeopardy.

title: The First Show of the Fourth Season
The Day Howard Moved In
description: Howard Sprague from Mayberry moves to Sherman Oaks, inspiring Garry to see "the goodness in us all."

title: The Wedding Show
description: The president of the network wants Garry and Phoebe to make their wedding a television special.

title: My Mother, the Wife
description: Garry keeps seeing visions of his mother every time he tries to make love on his anniversary.
